mapper.insert: insert into assess_cars ( id, code, vincode, dt_add, mem_id, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_states, mem_citys, brid, seid, carid, car_days, car_km, color_id, price_new, model_score, parts_score, gaso_score, color_score, items_score, hide_score, score, price_result, gems_id, gems_code, imgurl, gems_fs_id, vincode2, ico_1, ico_2, ico_3, ico_4, ico_5, ico_6, ico_7, ico_8, ico_9, ico_10, ico_11, ico_12, ico_13, ico_14, ico_15, ico_16, ico_17, ico_18, ico_19, ico_20, ico_21, bc_status, bc_type, motorcode, dt_edit, c_tel, c_carno, cbs_orderid, cbs_result, qryid_bx, qryid_by, qryid_qryid, orderid )values( #{id}, #{code}, #{vincode}, #{dt_add}, #{mem_id}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_tel}, #{mem_states}, #{mem_citys}, #{brid}, #{seid}, #{carid}, #{car_days}, #{car_km}, #{color_id}, #{price_new}, #{model_score}, #{parts_score}, #{gaso_score}, #{color_score}, #{items_score}, #{hide_score}, #{score}, #{price_result}, #{gems_id}, #{gems_code}, #{imgurl}, #{gems_fs_id}, #{vincode2}, #{ico_1}, #{ico_2}, #{ico_3}, #{ico_4}, #{ico_5}, #{ico_6}, #{ico_7}, #{ico_8}, #{ico_9}, #{ico_10}, #{ico_11}, #{ico_12}, #{ico_13}, #{ico_14}, #{ico_15}, #{ico_16}, #{ico_17}, #{ico_18}, #{ico_19}, #{ico_20}, #{ico_21}, #{bc_status}, #{bc_type}, #{motorcode}, #{dt_edit}, #{c_tel}, #{c_carno}, #{cbs_orderid}, #{cbs_result}, #{qryid_bx}, #{qryid_by}, #{qryid_qryid}, #{orderid} )
